'''Oculus''' (plural '''Oculi''') a collectible orb of elemental energy, is an Adventure Item, that can be found scattered across [[Teyvat]]. Oculi can be offered to their corresponding [[Statue of The Seven]] for rewards. Oculi can only be found in the overworld, and will not appear in [[Chests]]. Oculi are also limited and do not respawn.

When an overworld Oculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use their corresponding [[Oculus Resonance Stone]] to mark the location of an Oculus on the map.

'''See the [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=5,6,194 Teyvat Interactive Map] for locations.'''

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Oculi}}

==Total==
* 66 [[Anemoculi]] can be found in [[Mondstadt]].
* 131 [[Geoculi]] can be found in [[Liyue]].
* 181 [[Electroculi]] can be found in [[Inazuma]].
* 235 [[Dendroculi]] can be found in [[Sumeru]]. (as of [[Version 3.4]])

==Trivia==
*Upon collecting every Oculus in a region and leveling up your Statues of The Seven to their max level, you will have one Oculus left over of each element.
*The Oculi take approximately the same shape as the [[Vision]] orb for their region.
*Playable characters will look at nearby Oculi, similar to how they respond to NPCs.
